projects.title: AJ's Lawn and Home
projects.about: A website designed and built with brand-consistent and search engine optimization best practices to establish and grow the client's online presence.

projects.title: David Chu's China Bistro
projects.about: A pixel-perfect implementation of the original website, refactored from Bootstrap 3 to Bootstrap 5. This website was built as a capstone for a web development certification course.

projects.title: Shopify Project
projects.about: Collaborating with a local artist to increase their online product sales. This ecommerce web app is using a Nuxt and Vuetify front end with a headless Shopify API backend.
